meanings.definition: Feeling or showing extreme happiness or excitement
meanings.sent1: She was the slaphappiest person at the party, smiling from ear to ear.
meanings.sent2: The children were slaphappiest when they found out they were going to the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The puppy looked slaphappiest when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the slaphappiest sound in the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons made the birthday party atmosphere even slaphappiest.

meanings.definition: The most happy or excited out of a group
meanings.sent1: Among all the contestants, she was the slaphappiest after winning the prize.
meanings.sent2: The little girl's face lit up with the slaphappiest expression when she saw her birthday cake.
meanings.sent3: The team captain was the slaphappiest player on the field after scoring the winning goal.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled with the slaphappiest gleam as he opened the long-awaited gift.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the crowd made him feel like the slaphappiest person in the stadium.
